name: Bimza Slots
description:
Bimza Slots is every slot player’s dream!

• Unlimited Free Credits
• Bonus Credits Every 2 Hours
• Unique & Exciting Slots
• More Slots In Future Updates
• No Annoying “Loading…” Screens
• No Internet Connection Required
• ... Oh, and it's FREE!

Current Slots:
Diamond VIP - 10, 15, or 25 Free Spins with 2x multiplier!
Sweet Wins - Spin While You Win with increasing multiplier!
Ocean Luck - Unlock Treasure When you get 4+ Keys!
American Tour - 8 Free Spins with Expanded Sticky Wilds!
Lucky Route - Includes 4 Random bonuses!
Yo Monster - Lots of Free Spins, just 2 Crazy Monster Symbols to start the fun!
iTap Toons - Sticky Wilds hold during bonus round, only 2 bonus symbols triggers bonus.

More slots are coming in future updates. There’s even an option for you to participate in the new machines by telling us the kind you like!

In addition to the unlimited Free Credits (up to 500, at a time) Bimza Slots offers In-App Purchases for those who want to buy credits. Note: Bimza Slots is for entertainment purposes only - there is no cash value for credits. Credits purchased are for the device they are purchased on. Credits are non-transferable.
